mapper.select: SELECT T.IDX AS IDX , T.CINEMAIDX AS CINEMAIDX , T.NAME AS NAME , T.SEATS AS SEATS , T.STATE AS STATE , C.NAME AS CINEMANAME , C.CODE AS CODE FROM T_CINEMA C INNER JOIN T_THEATER T ON (C.IDX=T.CINEMAIDX) WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY T.IDX DESC

SELECT T.IDX AS IDX , T.CINEMAIDX AS CINEMAIDX , T.NAME AS NAME , T.SEATS AS SEATS , T.STATE AS STATE , C.NAME AS CINEMANAME , C.CODE AS CODE FROM T_CINEMA C INNER JOIN T_THEATER T ON (C.IDX=T.CINEMAIDX) WHERE T.IDX = #{idx}
